CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name = "Project Workbook Load", HYPERLINK("https://7summitsagency.my.salesforce.com/" & Id, RecordType.Name + "-" + Opportunity__r.Name), IF( RecordType.Name = "New User", HYPERLINK("https://7summitsagency.my.salesforce.com/" & Id, RecordType.Name + "-" + First_Name__c + " " + Last_Name__c), IF( RecordType.Name = "Nonbill Assignment",HYPERLINK("https://7summitsagency.my.salesforce.com/" & Id, RecordType.Name + "-" + Project__r.Name), IF( RecordType.Name = "Time Movement", HYPERLINK("https://7summitsagency.my.salesforce.com/" & Id, RecordType.Name + "-" + From_Assignment__r.pse__Resource__r.psa_report__Resource_Name__c + "-" + From_Project__r.Name), RecordType.DeveloperName ))))
CustomField.label: Request Name
